translation: Be shk chuh aashi yhi (qrān) shbi qdr mnz nạzl kormut.
Th tohyhi kya chuhv smujh mut (zi) shbi qdr kya chhe?
Shbi qdrchhe (fẓylt th brkt th aajrvthvabs mnz) sasav rytv khvth bhtr.
Aath (rạcz) mnz chih frshth byyhi rvḥ alamyn (jbryl) pnnis rb sndi ḥkmh sintụ̄ (khyrvbrktkụ̄) tmam ḥkm hyth vasan.
Yhi (rat) chhe fjr ṭlvʿ spdns tam (srasr) rczar.
